body:
What I mean about setsockopt is that there is no syscall.Setsockopt function nor is there a x/sys/unix.Setsockopt function.  Instead there is SetsockoptInt, SetsockoptByte, SetsockoptInet4Addr, etc.

Similarly, there should not be any x/sys/unix.Ioctl function.  There should be IoctlInt, IoctlTermios, etc.
